full_summary:
## Notification of Open Tender: Adapter Oxygen Filler
### Solicitation Number
W8485-258520/A
### Closing Date
2024-12-20T14:00:00
### Location
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit their bids for the procurement of an Adapter Oxygen Filler according to the specifications outlined below. 

### Overview of Scope of Work
- Adapter, Oxygen Filler, 25 Units
- GSIN: 25202607, UNSPSC: Aircraft Oxygen Equipment
- Product Specifications: T186C100-11, NCAGE: 30941
- Unit of Issue: Each
- Delivery Location: 25 CFSD Montreal
- Delivery Date: Before 2025-03-31

### Equivalent or Substitute Products
Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name, model and/or part number and the NCAGE of the product offered.

### Submission Requirements
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic and reduced business hours at the bid receiving unit, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of other bid delivery methods.

### Tender Process
The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement. The selection of the winning bid will be based on the Lowest Price criterion.

### Submission Contact
- Name: Dany Lebel
- Email: <dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca>
- Phone: (000) 000-0000

Please find the Tender Notice and Bid Solicitation document attached to this notice.

[Attachments]
- Tender Notice (PDF)
- Bid Solicitation Document (PDF)

Note that I've focused on providing the essential details while using professional language and proper punctuation. 

**Answer additional questions if necessary**
Do you need me to rewrite anything else for you? If you need, I can also provide you with a table of contents to the attached tender notice and bid solicitation document.
